00031 // Documentation for this file. If the \file tag isn't present,
00032 // this file won't be documented.
00039 #ifndef _PIC24_ALL_H_
00040 #define _PIC24_ALL_H_
00041 
00042 // Include processor-specific header file
00043 #if defined(__PIC24H__)
00044 #include "p24hxxxx.h"
00045 #elif defined(__PIC24F__)
00046 #include "p24fxxxx.h"
00047 #elif defined(__dsPIC33F__)
00048 #include "p33fxxxx.h"
00049 #elif defined(__PIC24FK__)
00050 #include "p24fxxxx.h"      //this is a variant of the PIC24F family
00051 #else
00052 #error Unknown processor.
00053 #endif
00054 
00055 // Include user-configurable options
00056 #include "pic24_libconfig.h"
00057 
00058 // Include PIC24 support library headers
00059 #include "pic24_generic.h"
00060 #include "stdint.h"
00061 #include "pic24_unittest.h"
00062 #include "pic24_clockfreq.h"
00063 #include "pic24_delay.h"
00064 #include "pic24_ports.h"
00065 #include "pic24_pyports.h"
00066 
00067 #ifndef BUILT_ON_ESOS
00068 #include "pic24_uart.h"
00069 #include "pic24_serial.h"
00070 #include "pic24_util.h"
00071 #endif
00072 
00073 #include "pic24_timer.h"
00074 #include "pic24_i2c.h"
00075 #include "pic24_spi.h"
00076 #include "pic24_adc.h"

00079 #include "pic24_flash.h"
00080 #include "pic24_comparator.h"
00081
